start.name: Start from repository
start.description: Start to work in a particular existing repository

deliver.name: Push code
deliver.description: Deliver code to a develop branch with test in a particular existing repository

release.name: Release tag
release.description: Deliver code to a master branch with test in a particular existing repository and tag if everything is ok

publish.name: Publish repository
publish.description: Publish repository to a software repository (npm,...)

environment.name: Environment Checks
environment.description: Checks and install if an environment is ok
